altTitles.ja: 聖闘士星矢 海皇再起 RERISE OF POSEIDON

altTitles.pt-br: Os Cavaleiros do Zodíaco - O Retorno de Poseidon

altTitles.ja-ro: Saint Seiya: Kaiou Saiki RERISE OF POSEIDON

description.en:
The sanctuary is exhausted after the battle against the Lord of Darkness Hades.
In the absence of Seiya and the others, the land was about to meet its end in the wrath of the goddess Nemesis!
At that moment, the Emperor of the Sea Poseidon awakens to Hades' call and, together with the Seven Marina Generals challenges Nemesis and their Heroic Souls who serve her in battle!
description.es:
El santuario está agotado tras la batalla contra el Señor de la Oscuridad Hades.
En ausencia de Seiya y los demás, ¡la tierra estaba a punto de encontrar su fin en la ira de la diosa Némesis!
¡En ese momento, el Emperador del Mar Poseidón despierta a la llamada de Hades y, junto con los Siete Generales del Mar, desafía a Némesis y a las Almas Heroicas que le sirven en la batalla!
description.ja:
冥王ハーデスとの闘いで疲弊した聖域。
星矢たちも不在でという中で、女神ネメシスの怒りにふれ地上は破滅の時を迎えようとしていた！
その時、ハーデスの呼びかけで覚醒した海皇ポセイドンは、七人の海将軍と共に、ネメシスとそれに仕える英魂士に戦いを挑む！
description.es-la:
El santuario está agotado tras la batalla contra el Señor de la Oscuridad Hades.
En ausencia de Seiya y los demás, ¡la tierra estaba a punto de encontrar su fin en la ira de la diosa Némesis!
¡En ese momento, el Emperador del Mar Poseidón despierta a la llamada de Hades y, junto con los Siete Generales del Mar, desafía a Némesis y a las Almas Heroicas que le sirven en la batalla!

altTitles.ja: ぼっち・ざ・ろっく！

description.en:
Hitori Gotou is a high school girl who's starting to learn to play the guitar because she dreams of being in a band, 
but she's so shy that she hasn't made a single friend. 
However her dream might come true after she meets Nijika Ijichi, a drummer girl looking for a new guitarist for her band.
description.es: Bocchi The Rock! cuenta la historia de Goto Hitori, una chica de secundaria que empieza a aprender a tocar la guitarra persiguiendo su sueño de formar parte de una banda. Pese a que es muy dedicada, su arrolladora timidez le impide poder conseguir siquiera una amiga. Pero cuando conozca a Ijichi Nijika, una baterista que está buscando una nueva guitarrista para su grupo, Goto dará el primer paso para cumplir su gran sueño página a página, tira a tira.
description.it:
Hitori Goto è una liceale che inizia a imparare a suonare la chitarra perchè il suo sogno è di entrare a far parte di una band, 
ma è talmente timida da non avere nemmeno un amico. 
Ma il suo sogno potrebbe avverarsi in seguito all'incontro con Nijika Ijichi, una ragazza che suona la batteria 
ed è alla ricerca proprio di un chitarrista per la band in cui suona.
description.ja:
「ぼっちちゃん」こと後藤ひとりは、ギターを愛する孤独な少女。
家で一人寂しく弾くだけの毎日でしたが、ひょんなことから伊地知虹夏が率いる「結束バンド」に加入することに。
人前での演奏に不慣れな後藤は、立派なバンドマンになれるのか――！？
全国のぼっちな少年少女に届ける、いま最高にアツい音楽漫画！！
陰キャならロックをやれ！！！
description.pt-br:
Hitori Gotou é uma colegial que está começando a aprender a tocar violão porque sonha em fazer parte de uma banda, mas é tão tímida que não fez um único amigo. No entanto, seu sonho pode se tornar realidade depois que ela conhece Nijika Ijichi, uma garota que toca bateria e está procurando um novo guitarrista para sua banda.

[ 1° TEMP.  DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 2, Cap 21. ]

altTitles.en: I Became a Student at the Transcension Academy
I Became a Student at Transcendental Academy

description.en:
After a hundred years of monsters, it’s become the norm to train at hunter academies if you want to become a professional monster hunter. And that’s just what hard-working orphan Seojun Kim dreams of.

But after a freak accident dashes his hopes, ads for the mysterious Transcendent Academy pop up on his phone, offering him a chance to train virtually with history’s most legendary warriors. As he levels up, he’s soon caught up in the world of hunter academies, dungeon raids, and competitive tournaments.

But the more he learns, the more questions he has about the people surrounding him, his past, and the secrets of the Transcendent Academy.
description.ko:
돌아가신 부모님의 빚을 갚으며 헌터가 되기 위해 헌터학원에 갈 돈을 모아왔던 서준은
불의의 사고로 모은 돈을 전부 수술비로 써버린다.
절망에 빠진 순간

띠링-!

이상한 광고가 재생되었다.

[야 너도 초월자 될 수 있어!]

더 이상 잃을 것도 없다, 회원 가입!!

[김서준 님 초월자 학원에 오신 걸 환영합니다].

내가 다니는 헌터학원은 다른 학원들과 '차원'이 다르다!

헌터도 학원을 다니는 헌터 사교육 시대!

야 너도 초월자 될 수 있어!

altTitles.ja: 4コマ勇者

description.en:
The Hero has defeated the Demon King! But the Princess he meant to save turned out to be a Prince. NEETdom, here he comes, but a life of relaxation surrounded by animes is a pretty sweet deal.  
  
Unfortunately, he gets caught up in millennia old legends, curses, and a twisted plot involving multiple Kingdoms and many dragons. Through and through, though, he'll follow a path of whimsy, even if that involves him palling it up with "villains".
description.ru:
Самая обычная история, в которой самый обычный герой убивает самого обычного сатану. С него падает самый обычный журнал 18+. Самый обычный герой, немного полистав его, идёт спасать самую обычную принцессу, которая оказалась самым обычным принцем. Что же будет делать наш самый обычный герой?

---

(Source: yagami)

altTitles.th: ตั๋วโกงชีวิต

description.en:
Lee Kyung Ho's mind was engulfed with ending his life due to bullying and the loss of his mother. He attempts to, but is saved. His determination to commit suicide somehow entices Sierra, a grim reaper who later offers him a contract. This contract blesses him with the ability to borrow the powers of the dead in their previous life in return of sacrificing years from his lifespan. For the sake of attaining what he wishes for, he eventually agrees to it.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Naver](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=730656)

---
**Official Translations:** [Chinese (Traditional Characters) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/fantasy/theboyofdeath/list?title_no=1771),  [Indonesian / Bahasa](https://www.webtoons.com/id/action/ticket-hero/list?title_no=2195)
description.fr:
L'esprit de Lee Kyung Ho était complètement bouleversé à l'idée de mettre fin à ses jours à cause du harcèlement et de la perte de sa mère. Il essaie, mais il est sauvé. Sa détermination à se suicider séduit Sierra, une faucheuse sinistre qui lui offre plus tard un pacte. Ce pacte lui permet d'emprunter les pouvoirs des morts dans leur vie antérieure en échange de plusieurs années sacrifiées de sa vie. Afin d'atteindre ce qu'il souhaite, il finit par l'accepter.  
  
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/fantasy/theboyofdeath/list?title_no=1771)
description.ru: Ли Кён Хо был поглощен идеей суицида, из-за издевательств в школе и гибели его матери. Очередная попытка, но спасен. Его решимость покончить с собой каким-то образом соблазняет Сиеру, мрачного жнеца, который позже предлагает ему контракт. Этот контракт даёт возможность заимствовать способности и силы мертвых из их предыдущей жизни, в обмен на силу, он должен жертвовать годами, которые ему остались на этой земле. Ради достижения того, чего он желает, он всё таки соглашается на сделку.
description.es-la: Lee Kyung Ho queria terminar su vida debido al acoso y la pérdida de su madre. Intenta hacerlo, pero no lo consigue. Su determinación de suicidarse de alguna manera fracasa, una persona llega y le ofrece un contrato. Este contrato lo bendice con la capacidad de tomar prestados los poderes de los muertos en su vida anterior a cambio de sacrificar años de su vida. Para lograr lo que desea y el acepta el trato.

altTitles.zh: 顶级气运，悄悄修炼千年

altTitles.en: Top Tier Providence- Secretly Cultivate for a Thousand Years
Top Tier Providence: Secretly Cultivate for a Thousand Years

description.en:
Being reincarnated in a cultivation world, Han Jue realizes that he can live his life like a video game. He can reroll his cultivation potential and connate providence.

So, he spends 11 years rerolling for a good one…

[Unparalleled: Immortal beauty, top-notch charm]

[Destined Sword fanatic: Top-notch Sword Dao aptitude, top-notch Sword Dao comprehension]

[Unparalleled Movement Technique: Top-notch movement technique aptitude]

[Descendant of the Immortal Emperor: You will receive an unparalleled cultivation technique and 1,000 superior-grade spirit stones]

In pursuit of longevity, Han Jue decides to cultivate in a low-profile manner.
A thousand years later, generations of cultivators have become history.

That is when beings of the fairyland start cleansing the mortal world. Han Jue can no longer hide and has no choice but to take action.

Then he realizes, that deities and gods aren’t that powerful after all!

Scholar Woon Hyun enters the palace after passing the Imperial Examination.
Though he soon comes to lament his poor and miserable life of having to deal with the Crown Prince’s hobbies,
Despite that, he doesn’t give up and tries his best to learn martial arts.
But Woon Hyun suddenly picks up his brush to conquer the Murim?!

The hidden story of the scholar who passed the Imperial Examination at a young age begins. 

---

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%95%99%EC%82%AC%EA%B2%80%EC%A0%84/2895)
description.ko:
장원에 급제하여 입궁한 학사 운현.
황태자의 취미생활을 전담하는 초라하고 처량한 신세를 한탄하지만,
그럼에도 포기하지 않고 최선을 다해 무공을 익힌다.
그러던 운현은 갑자기 무림을 제패하기 위해 붓을 드는데?!

젊은 나이에 장원에 급제한 학사의 숨겨진 이야기가 시작된다.

---

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%95%99%EC%82%AC%EA%B2%80%EC%A0%84/2895)

description.en: Min Hu Chu, a guy who lives to eat and So Geum Ji, a girl who eats to live. They’re both childhood friends but with complete different opinions on the purpose of food. Focusing on these two characters, introducing a story that includes recipes to make alone(?) and their campus life(!) The author of ‘Second Lead Complex’, Soi’s beginning of a new series!
description.ko: 먹기 위해 사는 민후추와 살기 위해 먹는 소금지. 소꼽친구지 만 음식에 대한 가치관이 전혀 다른 두 사람. 둘을 중심으로 펼 쳐지는 자취 요리(?)와 캠퍼스 라이프(!) 서브 콤플렉스 소이 작가의 신작!

description.en:
Sangwoo, an average sophomore in college, always dreamt of having multiple versions of himself - one for study, another for play.

One day, he awakens with a skill called [Cloning], and Sangwoo thinks his dream has come true. But will cloning really steer his life in the direction he had hoped for, or does fate have other plans in store?

300 years ago, the invincible warrior Hyeon-oh Kim brought down the Tower of the End, preventing the world’s demise. Though he should have died the moment the Tower of the End collapsed, Hyeon-oh is reborn 300 years later in the body of a 17-year-old boy named Juhyeok Kim.

Meanwhile, he discovers the existence of the Constellations, who were once his disciples 300 years ago but were born during the time when he did not exist in this world. Will he be able to find them again and train them?

altTitles.en: Convenience Store Worker From Another World

description.en: The protagonist Chan, who was looking for a part-time job after his previous company went bankrupt, coincidentally discovers a convenience store. Lured by the very high hourly wage, he decides to become a part-timer from that day. But the customers who come in seem a bit strange. Vampires, kobolds, and even succubi??
description.pt-br: O protagonista Chan, que estava procurando um trabalho de meio período depois que sua empresa anterior faliu, descobre por acaso uma loja de conveniência. Atraído pelo salário por hora extremamente alto, ele decide começar a trabalhar lá a partir daquele dia. Mas os clientes que entram parecem um pouco estranhos. Vampiros, kobolds e até succubus??

description.en:
Even he, Kang Geon-woo, a genius major leaguer who gained wealth, fame, and everything, could not continue a happy married life with his wife. He, who felt regretful about his wife's absence, returned to the past with the power of a mysterious ring.

As a high school student in the midst of a fresh romance, will he be able to find love this time?

altTitles.ja: シブヤニアファミリー

description.en: A small series that frankly depicts the circumstances of a third-grade girl living in Shibuya and her family.
description.ja:
渋谷に住む小３女子とその家族の事情を赤裸々に描く小型連載。
最後に書いてある「しぶや係日誌」も見てね。

altTitles.ja: ポケットモンスターSPECIAL スカーレット・バイオレット

description.en: Violet, the “prince of speed” who drives Miraidon, runs through the Paldea region in search of the “secret spice” to regain the ability of Miraidon! A showdown with the Nushi Pokemon! Operation Stardust! And the other main character...!?
description.es: Violet, el “príncipe de la velocidad” que conduce a Miraidon, corre por la región de Paldea en busca de la “especia secreta” para recuperar la habilidad de Miraidon. ¡Un enfrentamiento con el Pokémon Nushi! ¡Operación Polvo de Estrellas! ¿¡Y el otro personaje principal...!?
description.ja: ミライドンを駆る“スピード王子”バイオレットが、ミライドンの能力を取り戻すべく「秘伝スパイス」を求めてパルデア地方を駆け巡る！　ヌシポケモンとの対決！　スターダスト作戦！　そしてもう一人の主人公は…!?

description.en: A boy named Shi Shan and his little sister were offered as sacrifice to a demon that has been haunting their village. They were rescued by a martial artist who exorcised demons. He took the siblings in as his disciples and taught them the art of cultivation and about the demons that dwell in this world.

altTitles.ja: ダークサモナーとデキている

altTitles.zh: 黑暗召唤师在地下恋爱中

altTitles.zh-ro: Hēi'àn zhàohuàn shī zài dìxià liàn'ài zhōng

altTitles.ja: I'm dating a Dark Summoner

altTitles.vi: Hẹn hò cùng hắc thuật sư

description.en: Amona, a dark summoner and demi-human who uses demonic powers, is the newest addition to the party of the uptight priest Roni. Everyone expected the two to dislike each other and to have nothing to do with each other. But to their surprise, on their first day together as an adventuring party, they had a one-night stand...!
description.ja: クソ真面目な神官・ロニのパーティに新しく加入してきたのは、悪魔の力を使うダークサモナーで亜人のアモナ。反発し合い犬猿の仲になると思われた二人だったが、なんとパーティ加入初日に朝チュンしてしまい…！？

altTitles.ja: 推しの下僕になりまして

description.en: The protagonist, grieving the death of her favorite character, finds herself reincarnated into the game's world before her beloved's demise! As the mob character Lou Lurea, she resolves to save her favorite character no matter what. However, she is reincarnated into a magical academy filled with handsome vampires. As the only human, Lou is nothing more than a delicious treat to everyone. While being pursued as "prey" by the characters, she struggles to prevent her favorite's bad ending...?! A story begins where love for her favorite character changes destiny!

altTitles.ja: ケントゥリア

description.en: Stowing himself away on a slave ship, Julian sets sail for the great continent with a hundred slaves, all yearning for freedom, until...?! Embark on a groundbreaking journey through this action-packed dark fantasy saga!!
description.vi: Lén đi lậu trên một con tàu, Julian ra đi tìm đến đại lục cùng với một trăm người nô lệ khác... Ai ai cũng khao khát có được tự do, thế nhưng rồi...?!

Chu Du Ẩm Thực Tại Dị Giới Với Kỹ Năng Không Tưởng

description.en:
Mukouda Tsuyoshi has been summoned from modern Japan to a different world of sword and magic. He eagerly thought of what kind of a huge adventure was waiting for him, but actually, Mukouda is just a civilian who got caught in a Hero Summoning. On top of that, Mukouda’s base status is shabby compared to the legitimate heroes.
Suspecting the king of foul play, as he's morbidly obese in a kingdom in crisis, apart from being war-happy, Mukouda decides to leave the castle by presenting his lack of martial prowess. The only thing that Mukouda can rely on in this world is his unique skill Net Supermarket, that can only order goods from modern Japan’s internet to the new world.
description.es: Mukouda Tuyoshi ha sido invocado desde el Japón contemporáneo a un mundo fantástico de espadas y magia. Con ansia se emocionó con la gran aventura que le esperaba, pero Mukouda es solo un civil que fue traído por accidente durante la Invocación del Héroe. Aparte de todo, el nivel básico de Mukouda es mediocre comparado con el de los verdaderos héroes. Sospechando de malas intenciones por parte del rey, el cual es mórbidamente obeso en un reino en crisis aparte de ser aficionado a la guerra, Mukouda decide dejar el castillo argumentando su falta de capacidad de combate. El único factor con el cual Mukouda cuenta en este mundo es su habilidad "Supermercado de Red" que solamente puede ordenar bienes del internet del Japón moderno al nuevo mundo.
description.vi: Mukouda Tsuyomi, một chàng trai Nhật Bản hiện đại được triệu hồi sang thế giới của kiếm và ma thuật... Cứ tưởng sẽ có những chuyến phiêu lưu vĩ đại đang chờ đợi mình nhưng thực ra Makouda chỉ là một thường dân bị dính vào lễ [Triệu hồi Anh Hùng]. Nhận ra bản chất thật sự của việc triệu hồi anh hùng, Makouda đã rời đi và tự sinh sống tại thế giới mới với skill độc đáo [Siêu thị trực tuyến]. Và trên hết, hàng loạt những kẻ kỳ lạ bị thu hút bởi thức ăn từ thế giới hiện đại đã xuất hiện. Từ đó cuộc phiêu lưu của anh chàng bắt đầu.

altTitles.ja: 色憑くモノクローム

description.en:
Isshiki falls in love with a maiden who is pure and innocent, but he has been possessed by Asmodeus, the demon of lust. The demon tries to arouse Isshiki by stimulating the sexual desires of the girls around him in every possible way. However, in order to exorcise the demon and avoid the girls' suspicions, Isshiki must never get excited, no matter how lewd they may act!

"How can I stand this...!"
description.ja: 純潔を貫く乙女に恋をした主人公・一色は、よりにもよって色欲の悪魔アスモデウスに憑りつかれてしまった。悪魔はあの手この手で乙女たちの性欲を刺激して一色を興奮させようとしてくる。しかし、乙女に嫌われないためにも悪魔を祓うためにも一色は絶対に興奮してはならない……たとえそれがどんなに淫らな行為だとしても！「こんなの我慢できるわけ……っ！」エロスとピュア、究極のせめぎ合いラブコメ開戦！

altTitles.ja: 1級百合鑑定士
そくオチまゆりちゃん

description.en:
Mayuri-chan likes to tease her very, *very* close childhood friend, but she's not quite so brave when he counters her challenges **exponentially**!  
  
Watch Mayuri-chan lose WAY more than what she bargained for!**(*)**  
  
**(*)**clothes and dignity included
description.fr:
Mayuri-chan aime taquiner son ami d'enfance très, très proche, mais elle n'est pas aussi courageuse lorsqu'il relève ses défis de manière **exponentielle**!  
  
Regardez Mayuri-chan perdre PLUS que ce qu'elle avait prévu!**(*)**  
  
**(*)**vêtements et dignité inclus
description.pt-br: Mayuri-chan gosta de provocar seu amigo de infância, mas não aguenta quando ele revida!

altTitles.ja: 神絵師のおしごと
シャドーハウス
シャドーハウス カラー版

description.en:
Faceless shadow nobles living in a vast mansion, attended by living dolls who spend much of their time cleaning up the soot endlessly emitted by their mysterious masters.  
  
Follow the story of Emilyko, a young and cheerful living doll, as she learns her duties serving as the attendant for Kate Shadow-sama. What dangers and dark secrets will she and Kate encounter, as they become more deeply involved in the inner workings of the shadows' society?
description.es:
Nobles sombras sin rostro que viven en una vasta mansión, atendidos por muñecos vivientes que pasan gran parte de su tiempo limpiando el hollín emitido por sus misteriosos maestros.  
  
Sigue la historia de Emilyko, una joven y alegre muñeca viviente, mientras aprende sus deberes como asistente de Kate Shadow-sama.
description.ja: 不思議な洋館に住む、 顔のないシャドー一族と、 世話係の“生き人形”たち。 彼らが織りなす、 摩訶不思議な日常とは…？
description.ru: Безликие теневые дворяне, живущие в огромном особняке, сопровождаемые живыми куклами, которые проводят большую часть своего времени, очищая сажу, бесконечно испускаемую их таинственными хозяевами.
description.es-la: Sombras nobres vivem em uma imensa mansão e são servidos por bonecas vivas que passam a maior parte do tempo limpando a fuligem solta pelos misteriosos mestres. Siga a história de Emilyko, uma boneca viva jovem e animada, enquanto ela aprende seus deveres como serva de Kate Shadow-sama.

description.en:
Ruri, a high school student, woke up one morning to find that she had suddenly grown horns on her head!

Her mother told her that she might have inherited it because her father is a dragon. Ruri's mother tells her that she might have inherited it from her father, and she is puzzled, but goes to school anyway....

Her classmates are curious about the spontaneous horn, and another dragon constitution is revealed!

With a slight change in the usual routine, the daily life of Dragon Girl Ruri begins!

De acordo com sua mãe, o pai de Ruri, que ela nunca conheceu antes, é um dragão e Ruri só é metade humana. Esta é a história da jornada de autodescobrimento e aceitação de uma garota metade humana, metade dragão.

altTitles.en: I Accidentally Seduced the Male Lead's Younger Brother

description.en:
She possessed the mistress of the male lead in an R19 novel. In the original novel, the male lead was trash who abandoned her after getting her pregnant, saying that he belatedly realized that he loved the heroine. Fortunately, it was still before the original work started. She decided to scrap that shit herself.

"No, I don't want to," she flatly rejected Killian's offer to have an affair with him.

When he asked her why, she smiled brightly and answered, "Young Master is not my taste. If I must say, your younger brother is much preferable.”

"What? You prefer my younger brother?"

*Yeah. Not you, but your brother.*

Unlike the original, she firmly set up an iron wall, took care of Lexion, the younger brother who was abused by his elder brother, and protected the original female lead who had low-esteem from that shitty male lead.

And now that she'd already done what she had to do, she's off to go.

But a few years later–

Lexion, who had pushed out his older brother and taken the ducal title, came back to her as a beast with a decadent beauty. On top of that, he was even holding the engagement document that she had signed as a joke during their childhood.

"I've never forgotten you for a moment. Please marry me, Noona."

*No, wasn't that just for playing house?*

Every time she refuses his marriage proposal, he gently hugs her around the waist, and asks in a cold voice, "Did your taste change while I was away?"

Lexion's eyes were full of life as he asked.

It was as if when he found out who her type was, he'd kill them right away.

---

description.es:
“No, no quiero.”

La propuesta fue rechazada como un golpe en seco.

“Confucio no es de mi agrado. Mi preferencia es el hermano menor de Confucio”.

“¿Qué? ¿A mi hermana le gusta?”

“Así es. No tú, sino tu hermano.”

===

Ese ‘hermano menor’ vino a nosotros como una bestia con una belleza trascendental. 

“Nunca te he olvidado ni por un solo momento. Por favor, cásate conmigo, hermana.”

---

description.id:
Dia memiliki kekasih dari pemeran utama pria dalam novel R19. Dalam novel aslinya, pemeran utama pria adalah sampah yang mencampakkannya setelah membuatnya hamil, mengatakan bahwa dia terlambat menyadari bahwa dia mencintai pahlawan wanita tersebut. Untungnya, itu masih sebelum pekerjaan aslinya dimulai. Saya memutuskan untuk menghapus omong kosong ini sendiri. *** "Tidak, aku tidak mau". Aku dengan tegas menolak tawaran Killian untuk berselingkuh dengannya. Ketika dia bertanya mengapa, saya tersenyum cerah dan menjawab. “Tuan Muda tidak sesuai dengan seleraku. Jika saya harus mengatakan, adik laki-laki Anda jauh lebih disukai. ” "Itu? Apakah kamu lebih suka adik laki-lakiku?" "Ya. Bukan kamu, tapi kakakmu." *** Berbeda dengan aslinya, saya dengan kuat membangun tembok besi, merawat Lexion, adik laki-laki yang dilecehkan oleh kakak laki-lakinya, dan melindungi pemeran utama wanita asli yang memiliki harga rendah terhadap pemeran utama pria yang tidak bermutu itu. Dan sekarang setelah saya melakukan apa yang harus saya lakukan, saya akan pergi. Namun beberapa tahun kemudian, Lexion, yang melewati kakak laki-lakinya dan duduk di kursi sang duke, kembali kepadaku seperti binatang buas dengan kecantikan dekaden. Selain itu, dia bahkan memegang dokumen jaminan yang saya tandatangani sebagai lelucon saat masih kecil. “Aku tidak pernah melupakanmu sedetik pun. Tolong menikahlah denganku, noona.” Tidak, bukankah itu hanya untuk bermain rumah? Setiap kali saya menolak lamaran pernikahannya, dia dengan lembut memeluk pinggang saya dan bertanya kepada saya dengan suara yang begitu dingin. "Apakah seleramu berubah saat aku pergi?" Mata Lexion penuh dengan kehidupan saat dia bertanya. Ini seperti ketika dia mengetahui siapa tipeku, dia akan langsung membunuhnya.

---

description.ru:
Обычный офисный работник перевоплотился в романе 18+ в второстепенного персонажа, который изначально был любовницей главного героя. В оригинальном романе главный герой бросил ее после того, как она забеременела, сказав, что запоздало понял, что любит главную героиню. Теперь у нее есть шанс изменить судьбу этого персонажа и отказать главному герою: «Я на это не соглашусь!»

description.vi:
Tôi đã sở hữu cơ thể người yêu của nam chính trong một cuốn tiểu thuyết 19+. Trong nguyên tác, nam chính đích thị là một tên rác rưởi. Anh ta đã vứt bỏ cô sau khi làm cô có thai, còn bonus thêm câu anh ta đã vô tình rơi vào lưới tình của nữ chính. May thay, hiện giờ nguyên tác chưa bắt đầu. Vậy nên, tôi đã quyết định tự mình loại bỏ tên rác rưởi đó. *** “Không thích” Tôi đã nhanh chóng từ chối lời đề nghị làm người yêu từ Killian. Anh ta muốn hỏi tôi lý do với khuôn mặt đầy dấu chấm hỏi, tôi chỉ nhẹ nhàng nở nụ cười rạng rở và trả lời. “Thiếu gia đây không phải gu tôi. Gu tôi chính là em trai của thiếu gia cơ” “Gì? Em thích em trai của ta?” Chính xác rồi đó anh trai. Không phải anh, mà là em trai của anh cơ. *** Không như nguyên tác, tôi đã xây dựng một bức tường thành chắc chắn nhằm ngăn chặn tên thiếu gia kia. Bắt đầu chăm sóc cho Lexion, người bị anh trai của mình ngược đãi và cũng chính là người đã bảo vệ nữ chính. Và khi đã hoàn thành công việc, tôi đã nhanh chóng tẩu thoát khỏi dinh thự công tước. Nhưng trôi qua mấy năm. Lexion, người đã đẩy cái tên khốn kia ra khỏi vị trí công tước và tự mình ngồi chễm chệ trên vị trí đó đã trở thành một con thú và đến tìm tôi. Đồng thời còn mang theo một tờ giấy đính hôn có sẵn chữ ký như trò đùa khi nhỏ. “Em chưa hề quên chị dù chỉ một phút. Chị kết hôn với em nhé” Điều đó chẳng phải chỉ để con nít chơi với nhau à? Mỗi lần từ chối, anh ta lại bắt đầu quấn lấy eo của tôi mà ôm. Quá mệt mỏi, tôi đã hỏi anh ta với vẻ mặt nghiêm túc. “Chẳng lẽ em đã thay đổi gu trong thời gian chị vắng mặt?” Đôi mắt của Lexion chứa đầy sát khí khi tôi cất lời. Cứ như thể khi anh ta phát hiện ra gu của tôi là ai, anh ta sẽ giết người đó ngay lập tức.

---

description.zh:
“公爵不是我喜欢的类型，我喜欢的是公爵您的弟弟。” 果断拒绝油腻海王公爵的的提议，这一世我不会做你的情人，没想到随便使用的借口，却让对方上了心。那个小软萌弟弟长大后居然变成了一个病娇美男？“姐姐不是说喜欢我吗？”这个婚约该怎么拒绝呀！

---

description.pt-br:
**“Jovem mestre, você não faz o meu tipo… Eu quero o seu irmão!”**

“Você não faz o meu tipo, jovem mestre. Prefiro muito mais o seu irmão mais novo.”
“O quê? O meu irmão?”
“Isso mesmo, o seu irmão, não você.”

===
 Quando criança, eu assinei um contrato de casamento com este “irmão mais novo”, eu só não contava que…
“Eu nunca me esqueci de você, por favor, case-se comigo!”
Ele disse isso enquanto segurava o contrato que foi assinado quando éramos crianças, mas espera… não era tudo apenas uma brincadeira??!

---
"Não." Rejeitei categoricamente a oferta do canalha de ter um caso comigo. “O jovem mestre não é meu tipo. Meu tipo é seu irmão.” "O quê? Meu irmão é o seu tipo?" Garfos. Não você, mas seu irmão. * * * O 'irmão' veio até mim, uma fera da decadência. “Nunca me esqueci de você nem por um momento, quero que se case comigo, irmã.” Segurando os papéis de noivado que assinei de brincadeira na minha infância. Não, isso não era para uma brincadeira de criança? "Você mudou seus gostos enquanto eu estava fora?" Os olhos de Lexion estavam cheios de emoção quando ele perguntou. É como se ele soubesse do meu novo gosto, ele me mataria imediatamente.

---

description.en:
Satoru Takeichi, also known as Ichigo, works at a sawmill. 

While working, he got into a mechanical problem and ended up having the first joint of his right little finger amputated. He and other employees searched for the cut off part, but couldn't find it. 

Ichigo goes straight to the hospital and receives treatment. However, when he returned to his apartment after being hospitalized for a few days, he found another version of him... 

From there, a strange shared life with another [Himself] begins...
description.ja:
渦神 分裂増殖人間製材工場で働いている武市悟(たけいちさとる)、通称イチゴ。

彼は作業中に機械トラブルに巻き込まれ右手の小指の第一関節を切断してしまう。他の従業員と一緒に切り落とした部分を探したが見つからない。

イチゴはそのまま病院へ行き治療を受ける。しかし、数日の入院を経て自宅アパートへ帰ると、【もう 1 人の自分】がいた...。

そこからもう1 人の【二ゴー】との奇妙な共同生活が始まる......。

description.en:
Within the winding streets of Kyoto's geisha district lives a 16 year old girl named Kiyo. 
After failing to become a Maiko, a traditional dance apprentice, she starts working as caterer for her troupe. 
This is the story of her daily life.  

Published in Indonesian by Elex Media as **Juru Masak Para Maiko**.

Anime: [AniDB](https://anidb.net/anime/15476) | [MAL](https://myanimelist.net/anime/41556/Maiko-san_Chi_no_Makanai-san) | [ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=23951) | [LC](https://www.livechart.me/anime/9863) | [IMDB](https://www.imdb.com/title/tt13884016/)
Live-action dorama: [Netflix](https://www.netflix.com/title/81325501) | [MyDramaList](https://mydramalist.com/718203-kiyo-in-kyoto) | [IMDB](https://www.imdb.com/title/tt15964848/)
 
--- 
- **Won the 65th Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen Manga**
description.ja: ここは京都のど真ん中にある花街。 舞妓さんたちが深夜、お仕事を終えたあと帰ってきて、共同生活を送っているのは、「屋形」と呼ばれるおうちです。 とある屋形で「まかないさん」として舞妓さんたちに毎日の食事を作っているのは、なんと弱冠16歳の少女・キヨ。 彼女がまかないさんになったのには、ある意外な理由があって——。 華やかな花街の舞台裏、普通の日のごはんを通して、温かな人間模様が描かれます。

altTitles.ja: シドニアの騎士

description.en:
Risking his life to ensure humanity's survival, Tanikaze Nagate rides out in his silver armour, the Tsugumori!  
  
Thousands of years have passed since the Gauna destroyed the Solar System.  
The enormous seed ship, Sidonia, travels through space while propagating and producing humans.  
Brought up in the lowest decks of Sidonia, a young man, Tanikaze Nagate, becomes a Guardian trainee, and is authorized to pilot the outdated but historically renowned Tsugumori.  
The battle with Nagate's life at stake begins now!  
  
Won the 39th Kodansha Manga Award in the general category.

Gangnam lost his parents from a fire and has turned blind from the incident. He wasn't able to see anything but a hallucination called Kkamjang. Is Kkamjang actually a hallucination or something more? 'Your scars, your two eyes, and… even your strength! I'll change everything for you.'

description.en: Laurel Neales, the first princess of Tortia, has been married off to the emperor of Kairos following a political feud that ended with the assassination of her parents. Undiscouraged by the circumstances, Laurel refuses to give in to becoming yet another of the emperor's concubines. Instead, she plays along with his romantic whims and gains her own form of power in this new life by proposing an offer he cannot refuse: to facilitate his conquest of the land that betrayed her.

Shunpei, um estudante solitário do ensino médio, se tornou uma gal depois de salvar a deusa das gals de se afogar. Através das conexões de sua mãe, ele conseguiu transferir-se para uma escola só para meninas, mas estava cheia de gals!
 Todos os dias são uma sobrecarga sensorial para Shunpei, que nunca falou com uma garota, muito menos com uma gal.
 
 É o início de uma comédia escolar engraçada, com um cara introvertido do ensino médio => transformado em Gal.

This is a slightly naughty, heartful love comedy where this gentle pair will get to "enjoy" their youth to the fullest!!
description.ja:
マンガ喫茶で働く大学生・泉には気になっている常連さんがいた。 それは最近よく来店する女子高生のほなみちゃん。 どこか無防備で可愛らしい彼女には、 目を離せないある秘め事があって…！？ 青春を“まんきつ”する優しいふたりの ちょっとエッチなハートフルラブコメ！！

---

Manga kissa de hataraku daigakusei izumi ni wa ki ni natte iru jōren-san ga ita. Sore wa saikin yoku raiten suru mesukōsei no hona michan. Doko ka mubōbi de kawairashī kanojo ni wa,-me o hanasenai aru himegoto ga atte…!? Seishun o “ma n kitsu” suru yasashī futari no chottoetchina hātofururabukome!!
description.es-la: Izumi, un estudiante universitario que trabaja en un café de manga, tiene una clienta habitual que le interesa. Se trata de una chica de instituto, Honami, que últimamente frecuenta la tienda. ¡Su aspecto es algo inocente y tierno, pero tiene un secreto del que no puede apartar la vista...! ¡Una comedia romántica un poco atrevida sobre dos personas amables que disfrutan plenamente su juventud!
description.pt-br:
Izumi, um estudante universitário que trabalha meio período em um café de mangá, ficou curioso sobre uma cliente regular. O nome dela é Honami, uma estudante do ensino médio que tem vindo ao café mangá recentemente. Essa garota indefesa e aparentemente fofa de quem ele não consegue tirar os olhos tem um segredo...!?

Esta é uma comédia de amor um pouco safada e sincera, onde este gentil casal poderá "aproveitar" sua juventude ao máximo!!

altTitles.ja: ウマ娘シンデレラグレイ

description.en: Uma Musume: Cinderella Gray is a spin-off title of the Uma Musume project by Cygames. It follows Oguri Cap through her time at Kasamatsu Training Center Academy and on her journey of becoming a legendary horse girl.
description.ja: 寂れたカサマツの地に現れた、ひとりの灰被りの少女。後に“怪物”と呼ばれるその少女は、どこを目指して疾るのか――。地方から中央の伝説へ。
description.vi: Uma Musume: Cinderella Gray là một manga spin-off của series Uma Musume. Câu chuyện kể về Oguri Cap và cuộc hành trình trở thành một Mã Nương huyền thoại của cô.

altTitles.ja: シグルイ

description.en:
At the beginning of the Edo period (1603-1868), when people enjoyed a time of peace, Lord Tokugawa Tadanaga decides to hold a fighting tournament. In the past, matches were fought with wooden swords, but this time real swords will be used. The one-armed Fujiki Gennosuke and the blind Irako Seigen will fight each other in this tournament, even though both of them are disciples of Iwamoto Kogan — known as Japan's greatest swordsman. So begins the story of intertwining fates, conflict, and strange destinies.  
  
Note:  
It's SHOUNEN because it's published in Champion Red, a shounen magazine for late teens+early 20ies

altTitles.ja: 片思い　暗恋（AN LIAN）

description.en:
“I’ve recently come to like someone. He’s my classmate.”  
The short and sweet snapshots of a blossoming romance between two unsuspecting students! Packed with fluffy interactions between adorable (not to mention handsome!) characters, this series is sure to satisfy your sweet tooth~
description.fr: Les chassés croisés entre un garçon et une fille attirés l'un par l'autre en de courts moments. Tendre et amusant.Portuguese (BR) / Português (BR)Os cruzamentos entre um menino e uma menina que são atraídos um pelo outro em breves momentos. Se apaixonando lentamente…
description.it:
L'incrocio tra un ragazzo e una ragazza attratti l'uno dall'altra in pochi istanti. Si innamorano lentamente…..  
  
**Buy the official Vol. 1 on [Taobao](http://t.cn/A6bZZMgM)!**
description.kk:
«Мен сыныптасыма ғашық болып қалдым». 
«Мен бір қызға қызығушылық таныта бастадым». 
Бір-біріне жасырын ғашық болған сыныптастары туралы сүйкімді оқиға 
\ / (^ o ^) \ /
description.uk:
«Нещодавно мені дехто сподобався. Він мій однокласник».
Мила історія про двох, таємно закоханих одне в одного, студентів!
description.vi:
Thời học sinh bạn đã bao giờ crush ai chưa?
Cậu bạn cùng bàn?
Lớp trưởng học giỏi?
Hay một anh khóa trên điến trai?

Chắc hắn rất nhiều người trong chúng ta đều từng có một thời thầm thương trộm nhớ ai đó. Giống như cô bạn nhỏ nhắn Bách Linh và cậu hot boy An Dư Triết thầm thích nhau mà không hay vậy.

"Yêu thâm" là câu chuyện tuổi mới lớn với những ngại ngùng, quan tâm vô tình và ghen tuông nho nhỏ, khiến màu sắc cuộc sống của đôi bạn trẻ trở nên tươi đẹp và muôn màu hơn. Đồng thời bộ truyện cũng giúp người đọc trải nghiệm những cung bậc cảm xúc ngọt ngào, lãng mạn, đôi khi trầm lắng nhưng lại ngây ngô ngốc nghếch của cả hai.
description.pt-br:
Recentemente comecei a gostar de alguém. Ele é meu colega de classe.”
Os instantâneos curtos e doces de um romance florescente entre dois estudantes desavisados! Embalado com interações fofas entre personagens adoráveis ​​(para não mencionar bonitos!), esta série certamente satisfará seu desejo por doces

description.en:
There are animals that were abandoned by Dangun and live secretly in the human world. Narae, an ordinary high school student, discovers their existence...
A modern version of Beauty and the Beast with comedy and exorcism action.

‘Will the project of becoming human, for the animals that could not become human, be successful?'

altTitles.ja: ひまてん！

description.en: High school home ec expert Tenichi earns extra money with a part-time job cleaning houses. But one day, Himari, the owner and model of the popular cosmetics brand Hima Riz, transfers into his class. Say hello to some company president girl x house-cleaner boy romantic comedy hijinks!

Long, long ago in Neraland, the pious human built a great tower to show the respect to their Goddess Nera.  
Goddess Nera was deeply moved by human piety; to reward them, she opened a door at the top of the tower. This ethereal door connected to another world; it was known as *Heaven's Eye*.  
However…
description.fr:
Il y a fort longtemps au royaume de Nera, les fidèles humains érigèrent une tour en signe de leur respect pour leur déesse Nera.  
La déesse Nera, profondément touchée par la foi de ces derniers, ouvrit une porte au sommet de la tour pour les récompenser. Cette porte mystique était connectée à un autre monde. Elle fut dénommée *l'Œil céleste*.  
Mais un jour…
description.uk:
Давним-давно в Нераланді благочестиві люди побудували велику вежу, в знак поваги до своєї богині Нери.   
Богиня Нера була глибоко зворушена людським благочестям; щоб нагородити їх, вона відчинила двері на верхівці вежі. Ці ефірні двері пов'язані з іншим світом; І були відомі як *Райське Око*.  
Однак…  


---
description.zh: 很久以前，诺拉大陆的人类为了表示对诺拉女神最崇高的敬意，筑起了一座宏伟的高塔。 女神为人们的虔诚所动， 在高塔的顶端打开了一扇通往异世的大门。 来自另一个世界的羽族人为人类带来了文明与进步，但最终两族人在各种矛盾下刀戈相向。 战后数百年过去了，大陆再一次笼罩在不安与诡异的阴云中...
description.pt-br:
Há muito, muito tempo atrás em Neraland, o piedoso humano construiu uma grande torre para mostrar o respeito à sua deusa Nera.

Deusa Nera ficou comovida pela piedade humana; para recompensá-los, ela abriu uma porta no topo da torre. Esta porta etérea conectada a outro mundo; era conhecida como "Olho do Paraíso". 

 Contudo...

altTitles.en: Killing Blooms Under the Rounded Moon
Saku Kills on the Full Moon
Sword-Slicing Blossoms When the Moon is Full

altTitles.ja: 月輪に斬り咲く

description.en: A new transfer student has come into town, a girl with a mysterious air and black clothing who is called Inugami Sakuya. What few know is that by moonlight, she hunts and kills those possessed by "Inugami." A man can become possessed by being bitten, leading to a nighttime transformation into a beast driven to eat women. Sakuya gets no thanks for brutally ending the lives of these unfortunate men with her sword, and she is often too late to save the women they threaten. Sakuya also must deal with her own inner demons, which are all too real…
description.pt-br: Sakuya Inugami é uma misteriosa garota que caça seres chamados Inugami, homens que se transformam em terríveis feras comedoras de mulheres, após serem mordidos. Nessa difícil missão, Sakuya não recebe nenhum agradecimento e pior, tem que enfrentar seus próprios demônios internos.

title.en: The Legend of the Northern Blade

altTitles.ja: 北剣伝記

description.de:
Jahrzehntelang kämpften die tapferen Krieger der Nördlichen Himmlischen Sekte, um die Welt vor der bösartigen Stillen Nacht zu beschützen. Aber als der Anführer der vierten Generation beschuldigt wird, mit dem Feind gemeinsame Sache zu machen, ist er gezwungen, die Sekte aufzulösen und sich selbst umzubringen, um seinen Sohn Moowon zu beschützen. Ohne verbliebene Familie oder Verbündete lebt Moowon ein trostloses Leben unter ständiger Beobachtung ... bis ein plötzlicher Angriff der Stillen Nacht ihm die Gelegenheit gibt, in die Berge zu fliehen. Dort trainiert der junge Krieger, um die Kampftechniken seiner Vorfahren zu meistern, bevor das mysteriöse Verschwinden einer geliebten Person in zwingt, zurückzukehren. Folge Moowon auf seiner Reise, um den Tod seines Vaters zu rächen und die Bösewichte zu vernichten, die die Welt in Dunkelheit stürzen wollen!

description.en:
When the world was plunged into darkness by the ‘Silent Night’, Martial Artists from all over the place gathered to form the ‘Northern Heavenly Sect’. With overwhelming strength from the Northern Heavenly Sect, the Silent Night was pushed away and the people began to enjoy peace once more. However, as time passed the martial artists from the mainlands began to conspire against the ‘Northern Heavenly Sect’, and eventually caused the death of the Fourth Generation Sect Leader, Jin Kwan-Ho, destroying the sect with it. As everyone left the sect, Jin Kwan-Ho’s only son, Jin Mu-Won was left behind. Mu-Won has never learned anything about martial arts, but he eventually finds the Martial Techniques secretly left behind by his father and begins to acquire the martial arts of the Northern Heavenly Sect. Then one day, a mysterious girl appears before Mu-Won…!!

description.fr:
Depuis des décénies la secte céleste du nord se bat pour protéger le monde de la démoniaque Nuit Silencieuse. Mais le jour où le chef de la quatrième génération se retrouve accusé par l'alliance céleste d'avoir collaboré avec l'ennemi, il est obligé de dissoudre la secte et de s'ôter la vie pour protéger son fils, Moowon. Laissé seul, sans famille ni alliés, Moowon vit une vie morose, sous haute surveillance... jusqu'au moment où une attaque surprise de la Nuit Silencieuse lui donne une chance de s'échapper dans les montagnes. Là-bas, le jeune guerrier s'entraîne afin de maîtriser les techniques de combat de ses prédecesseurs, jusqu'à ce que la mort d'un être cher le ramène sur ses anciennes terres. Suivez l'histoire de Moowon, dans sa quête d'héroisme et de vengeance, tandis qu'il se bat pour éliminer ceux qui ont trahi son père, et les démons menaçant de plonger le monde dans l'obscurité !

description.ja:
かつて世の中を混乱に陥らせた集団「密夜」を倒すために、武術の達人たちを集めて作られた「北天門」！ その強力な守りの中で密夜は影を潜め、「北天門」は「中原」の平和を代表する集団となった。 しかし次第に「北天門」に対して妬みを持つ者が現れ、四代目門主「秦 虎星」は裏切り者達に囲まれた中、自ら命を絶ってしまう… 皆が去った「北天門」に一人残された虎星の息子、「秦 天翔」。武術に関しては何も知らない幼い少年だったが、人知れず父に伝授された古語によって「北天門」の壁に刻まれた武術を身につけ始める！ そんなある日、「秦 天翔」の前に正体不明の一人の娘が現れたのだが..!!

description.ko:
무협소설의 최강자 우각의 동명 소설 <북검전기>가 만화로 새롭게 태어나다!

세상을 혼란에 빠뜨린 집단 밀야에 맞서기 위해 중원의 고수들이 모여 만들어낸 북천문!
북천문의 강력한 투쟁으로 밀야는 서서히 그 모습을 감추었고, 북천문은 중원을 평화를 대표하는 집단으로서 강력한 위용을 과시하게 되었다.
그러나 평화가 길어지자 중원의 고수들 사이에서는 북천문에 대한 은밀한 시기가 생겨났고, 결국 북천문의 4대 문주인 진관호는 배신자들에게 둘러싸인 채 스스로 목숨을 끊음으로서 파국의 끝을 맞이하게 된다. 
모두가 떠난 북천문에 홀로 남은 진관호의 아들 진무원(13세)은 무공이라고는 손톱만큼도 알지 못 하는 어린 소년. 그러나 남몰래 아버지가 전수한 고어(古語)를 통해 북천문의 벽에 새겨진 무공을 익히기 시작한다. 
그러던 어느날, 진무원의 앞에 정체를 알 수 없는 한 소녀가 나타나게 되는데…!!

description.ru:
Когда мир погрузился во тьму, мастера боевых искусств собрались, чтобы сформировать «Северный небесный клан». Благодаря ей люди снова обрели мир и покой. Однако с течением времени мастера боевых искусств начали строить заговор против «северного небесного клана», который в конечном итоге привел к смерти лидера клана, Джин Кван-Хо, и уничтожению клана вместе с ним. Когда все покинули клан, единственный сын Джин Кван-Хо, Джин Му-Вон, остался в нем. Му-Вон никогда не изучал боевые искусства, но он находит Технику, тайно оставленную его отцом, и начинает изучать боевые искусства Северного Небесного Клана.

description.pt-br: Quando o mundo mergulhou na escuridão pela 'Noite Silenciosa', artistas marciais de todo o lugar se reuniram para formar a 'Seita Celestial do Norte'. Com uma força esmagadora da Seita Celestial do Norte, a Noite Silenciosa foi afastada e o povo começou a desfrutar a paz mais uma vez. No entanto, com o passar do tempo, os artistas marciais do continente começaram a conspirar contra a 'Seita Celestial do Norte' e, eventualmente, causaram a morte do líder da seita da quarta geração, Jin Kwan-Ho, destruindo a seita com ela. Quando todos deixaram a seita, o único filho de Jin Kwan-Ho, Jin Mu-Won, foi deixado para trás. Mu-Won nunca aprendeu nada sobre artes marciais, mas ele finalmente encontra as Técnicas Marciais secretamente deixadas para trás por seu pai e começa a adquirir as artes marciais da Seita Celestial do Norte. Então, um dia...

altTitles.ja: リップサービス
Lip service

description.en:
“This is what it means to be cool.”

A detective action story featuring 3 skillful individuals handling problems, one of whom is a woman who specializes in wearing all kinds of disguises.

title.en: Gods of All People: I Sacrificed Hundreds of Millions of Living Beings To Become a God

altTitles.zh: 全民神祇：我献祭亿万生灵成神

altTitles.en: Spirit Sacrifice: The Path to Godhood
Everyone Is a King: I Sacrifice Countless Lives to Become a King

description.en:
Han Wu transmigrated to a world where everyone can become a god. He obtained the ability to sacrifice life.
At the beginning, he had a trash clan, so he sacrificed to change his fate against the heavens.
With no power, no status, and no money, he sacrificed his way to the top.
As long as he has enough followers, he can become infinitely stronger through sacrifice, becoming the main god, the god of gods!

altTitles.ja: マネマネ にちにち

description.en: In a certain school lies a certain club and its three managers. Though unremarkable, days that can't be found anywhere else have begun! Drawn by Yamamoto Souichiro is a brand new Sports ground youth story!
description.fr: Dans une certaine lycée se trouve un certain club et ses trois managers. Bien qu'anodins, des jours comme on n'en trouve nulle part ailleurs voient le jour ! Dessiné par Yamamoto Souichiro : une toute nouvelle histoire de jeunesse sur le thème du sport !
description.tl: Sa isang partikular na paaralan ay may isang natatanging klab at ang tatlong tagapamahala nito. Bagama't hindi kapansin-pansin, ay nagsimula na ang mga araw na kahit saan ay hindi matatagpuan! Iginuhit ni Souichiro Yamamoto, ay isang bagong kuwento ng mga kabataan sa larangan ng isports!
description.vi: Slice of life của ba em quản lí CLB thể thao ở một trường cao trung nào đó... Để xem có gì hay!
description.pt-br: Numa determinada escola reside um determinado clube e as suas três ajudantes. Embora normais, dias que não podem ser encontrados em nenhum outro lugar começaram! Desenhado por Yamamoto Souichirou, é uma nova história juvenil de campo esportivo!
